RECIPE.INGREDIENT:
Chop coarsely : 5-6 ripe red tomatoes, 1 onion
 2 flakes garlic/ginger
 1 potato ( optional )
 2-3 carrots
 1 small cup grated fresh cotttage cheese ( paneer )
 coriander for garnish
 salt to taste
 5-6 black pepper kernels
RECIPE.PROCEDURE: Put all chopped veggies in a pressure cooker. Add salt and black pepper kernels. Close lid and after whistle simmer for 10-15 min. After it cools, mash in an electric mixer and strain . Just before serving add grated cottage cheese and garnish with coriander .
